data.title: Laurent Péron - Chief Revenue Officer at Alkemics
data.meta_description: Laurent Péron is currently the Chief Revenue Officer at Alkemics.
data.text:
Laurent Péron is currently the Chief Revenue Officer at Alkemics. Laurent has over 20 years of experience in sales and business development and has held various leadership positions at companies such as Salsify, GoCardless, Salesforce, Demandware (a Salesforce company), Oracle, BEA Systems, Plumtree Software, Tridion, and Marketschemer.

Péron started their career in sales and business development at Legendes Multimedia, a French multimedia company that they founded in 1996. Laurent then spent a year as the Product Marketing Manager at Intershop before moving on to Tridion, where they spent three years as the Marketing & Business Development Director for France.

In 2002, Péron left Tridion to start their own company, Marketschemer. Laurent ran Marketschemer for a year before joining Plumtree Software as the Business Development Director for Western Europe. Laurent spent four years at Plumtree before moving to BEA Systems, where they held the same position.

After three years at BEA Systems, Péron joined Oracle as the Europe South Sales Leader for Oracle WebCenter. Laurent spent two years at Oracle before moving to Salesforce, where they spent two years as the Area Vice President Sales Europe South / Commerce Cloud.

Most recently, Péron has been working as the Executive Vice President of Sales for EMEA at Salsify. Laurent has been in this role for just over a year.
